name: RequireJS
description: RequireJS is a JavaScript file and module loader. It is optimized for in-browser use, but it can be used in other JavaScript environments, like Rhino and Node. Using a modular script loader like RequireJS will improve the speed and quality of your code.

name: Moment.js
description: Parse, validate, manipulate, and display dates in JavaScript.

name: jPlayer
description: HTML5 Audio & Video for jQuery. The CSS styleable jQuery media player plugin with HTML5 support!

name: Toolbar.js
description: jQuery plugin to create tooltip style toobars

name: Hint.css
description: Hint.css is a tooltip library written in SASS which uses only HTML/CSS to create simple tooltips.

name: Sea.js
description: A Module Loader for the Web

name: Magnific Popup
description: Light and open source responsive lightbox plugin with focus on performance, for jQuery and Zepto.js. High-DPI (retina) display support, fast tap for touch devices.

name: Underscore.js
description: Underscore is a JavaScript library that provides a whole mess of useful functional programming helpers without extending any built-in objects.

name: Underscore.js 中文文档
description: Underscore 是一个JavaScript实用库,提供了类似Prototype.js (或 Ruby)的一些功能,但是没有继承任何JavaScript内置对象。

name: FastClick
description: FastClick is a simple, easy-to-use library for eliminating the 300ms delay between a physical tap and the firing of a click event on mobile browsers.

name: Turn.js
description: Turn.js makes a beautiful page turning effect using HTML5 and jQuery

name: jQuery.AjaxFileUpload.js
description: jQuery plugin to magically make file inputs upload via ajax
